content.title: ### {emoji.1024} Control Panel

description.base:
**This action will erase all current database data and replace it with data from the uploaded files.**
- This action cannot be undone! Make sure you have:
  - A backup of your current database
  - The correct zip file with old database files
  - The correct password
Are you sure you want to proceed?

content.title: ### {emoji.1037} Data Backup
content.description: Create and manage backups of your bot's data using Google Drive.

createBackupField.name: - **Create Backup**
createBackupField.value: - Set up Google Drive and create a backup of your current database. Daily automatic backups will be created at 00:00 UTC once setup is complete.

viewBackupsField.name: - **View Backups**
viewBackupsField.value: - View a list of your existing backups stored on Google Drive.

restoreBackupField.name: - **Restore Backup**
restoreBackupField.value: - Restore your database from a selected backup. A safety backup of your current database will be created before restoring.

resetOAuthField.name: - **Reset Google Drive OAuth**
resetOAuthField.value: - Reset your Google Drive authorization. Use this if you want to connect a different Google Drive account or if you encounter issues with the current connection.

description.base: Now that you've completed the guide, click the button below to enter your Google Client ID and Secret.
description.auth:
Please visit the link below and authorize the bot to access your Google Drive:
[Click Here to Authorize]({authUrl})
After authorizing, please enter the authorization code you receive in the button below.
description.wait:
Please wait while we create your backup and upload it to Google Drive.
This may take a few minutes depending on the size of your database.
description.success: Your Google Drive has been successfully connected! You can now create backups of your database. Click the Create Backup button to create your first backup.

createdField.name: - **Backup Details**

step1.title: ### Step 1: Create Google Cloud Project
step1.description:
Looks like you haven't set up Google Drive integration yet. To get started, you'll need to create a Google Cloud project.

First to [Google Cloud Console](<https://console.cloud.google.com>) and click on "Create or select a project"

step2.title: ### Step 2: Create The Project
step2.description: Next, click the "New Project" button in the top right corner of the popup. Give your project a name and click "Create". Once created click on select the project from the list to go to the project dashboard.

step3.title: ### Step 3: Enable Google Drive API
step3.description:
In the project dashboard, click on "Go to APIs overview".
Click on "Enable APIs and services" and search for "Google Drive API", then click the "Enable" button.

step4.title: ### Step 4: OAuth Consent Screen
step4.description:
In the left sidebar, navigate to "OAuth consent screen" and click "Get Started".
- Set a name for your app, select your email.
- For audience choose 'External'.
- Set your email in Contact Information.
- Agree to Google API services user data policy. Then click 'Create'.

step5.title: ### Step 5: Create OAuth client ID
step5.description:
Now click on "Create OAuth client", then select Desktop App as the application type and give it a name.
Finally, click "Create" and then make sure to note/copy down your client ID and secret from the popup.

step6.title: ### Step 6: Audience Authorization
step6.description: Navigate to audience tab and add the email you will use for backups as test user. This will allow you to authorize the bot to access your Google Drive for backups.

clientId.label: Client ID
clientId.placeholder: Enter your Google OAuth Client ID

clientSecret.label: Client Secret
clientSecret.placeholder: Enter your Google OAuth Client Secret

authCode.label: Authorization Code
authCode.description: Enter the authorization code you received after authorizing the bot

errors.invalidCode: {emoji.1050} Invalid authorization code format. Make sure you copied the entire code.
errors.stateNotFound: {emoji.1050} OAuth state not found. Please start setup again.
errors.authFailed:
{emoji.1050} **Troubleshooting:**
1. Make sure the code hasn't expired (copy and submit within 10 minutes)
2. Check that your Client ID and Secret are correct
3. Try the setup process again from the beginning
4. Restart the wizard by clicking 'Create Backup' button again
errors.noRefreshToken: {emoji.1050} Authorization failed - no refresh token received. Please try again and make sure you click "Allow" to grant access.

description.base: Here are your available backups. Click the links to download.
description.wait: Please wait while we retrieve your backups from Google Drive...
description.noBackups: It looks like you don't have any backups yet. Click the 'Create Backup' button to create your first backup or wait for automatic backups to be created.

backupField.name: {index}. **{backupName}**

content.footer: Total Backups: {totalBackups} | Auto-delete keeps only 5 most recent backups

errors.noToken: {emoji.1050} Google Drive not configured. Please click 'Create Backup' to set up OAuth first.
errors.setupIncomplete: {emoji.1050} OAuth setup is incomplete. Please click "Create Backup" and complete the authorization.

description.base:
**WARNING**: Restoring will replace all current data (except custom emojis)
Select a backup below to restore.
description.success:
Your database has been restored from the backup.
 Safety backup saved at: Temp folder, it will be deleted automatically after 24 hours.
description.wait:
Please wait while we restore your backup...
This may take a few minutes depending on the size of the backup.

warningField.name: - **This will**
warningField.value:
- Create a safety backup of your current database
  - Replace all current data with the selected backup (except custom emojis)
  - This action cannot be undone! Make sure you have a recent backup of your current database before proceeding.

restartingField.name: - **Bot is restarting automatically**
restartingField.value: - Please wait a moment for the bot to come back online.

content.downloading:
{emoji.1030} Downloading backup and preparing to restore...
This may take a few minutes depending on the size of the backup.
content.restoring:
{emoji.1030} Restoring backup...
This may take a few minutes depending on the size of the backup.

error.noToken: {emoji.1050} Google Drive not configured. Please click 'Create Backup' to set up OAuth first.
error.setupIncomplete: {emoji.1050} OAuth setup is incomplete. Please click "Create Backup" and complete the authorization.

title.success: ### {emoji.1004} Google Drive Authorization has been Reset

content.description:
This will erase the current Google Drive connection.
You'll need to set it up again by clicking 'Create Backup'.
content.success: Click 'Create Backup' to set up again.

content.title: ### {emoji.1039} Custom Emoji Management
content.description: Manage custom emojis for your bot.

addPackField.name: - **Create Pack**
addPackField.value: - create a new custom emoji pack to use in the bot

editPackField.name: - **Edit Pack**
editPackField.value: - Modify an existing custom emoji pack

viewPackField.name: - **View Pack**
viewPackField.value: - View all emojis in a pack

deletePackField.name: - **Delete Pack**
deletePackField.value: - Delete an existing custom emoji pack from the bot

reloadDefaultsField.name: - **Rrestore**
reloadDefaultsField.value: - Redownload and fix the default emoji pack

activatePackField.name: - **Activate Pack**
activatePackField.value: - Set a custom emoji pack as the active pack for the bot

shareField.name: - **Share Pack**
shareField.value: - Share your custom emoji packs with others

uploadField.name: - **Upload Pack**
uploadField.value: - Upload a custom emoji pack shared by another user

errors.nameExists: {emoji.1050} A pack with that name already exists.
errors.slotsNotEnough: {emoji.1050} Not enough emoji slots available (Need: {required}, Available: {available}).
errors.limitReached: {emoji.1050} Emoji slot limit reached! Please remove emojis before adding more.

errors.noPacks: {emoji.1050} No custom emoji packs found. Create one first!

content.title: ### {emoji.1049} View Emoji Pack
content.description: Select a pack to view all its emojis.

description.main: Are you sure you want to delete this Pack?
description.confirm: This action cannot be undone! Please confirm that you want to delete **{packName}**.

errors.noPacks: {emoji.1050} No custom emoji packs found. Create one first!

emojiInput.label: URL / Emoji
emojiInput.description: type \ before custome emojis and copy the resulting text (e.g., `<:emojiName:emojiId>`).

fileInput.label: Or Upload Image
fileInput.description: Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, GIF, webp. Max file size: 300 KB.

errors.invalidFileType: {emoji.1050} Invalid file type: {contentType}. Only images (PNG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP) are allowed.
errors.fileSizeExceeded: {emoji.1050} File size exceeded 300KB during download. Aborted at {size}KB

content.title: ### {emoji.1018} Export Emoji Pack
content.description: Select an emoji pack to generate a shareable file.
content.exportSuccess:
Successfully created emoji pack file 
Download and share it with others.

errors.noPacks: {emoji.1050} No custom emoji packs found. Create one first!
errors.exportFailed: {emoji.1050} Failed to export pack. Please try again.

nameInput.label: Pack Name
nameInput.placeholder: Enter a name for this emoji pack

errors.slotsNotEnough: {emoji.1050} Not enough emoji slots available (Need: {required}, Available: {available}).
errors.invalidFileType: {emoji.1050} Invalid file type. Please upload a `.json` file.
errors.fileTooLarge: {emoji.1050} File size exceeds the 5 MB limit. Please upload a smaller file.
errors.missingInfo: {emoji.1050} Missing required information in the file or no emojis to upload.
errors.uploadExpired: {emoji.1050} Upload session expired. Please upload the file again.
errors.nameExists: {emoji.1050} A pack with the name already exists. Please rename your pack.

description.main:
Activating emoji pack: {packName}
- Global
  - Sets the selected pack as active for all admins without a personal selection.
- Personal
  - Sets the selected pack as active for you only.
description.globalActivated: {emoji.1004} {packName} is now the globally active emoji pack!
description.personalActivated: {emoji.1004} {packName} is now your personally active emoji pack!

content.title: ### {emoji.1033} Reloading Default Pack
content.description: Restoring the default emoji pack. This will redownload the original emojis and fix any issues in the default pack.
content.reloading: {emoji.1030} Reloading default emoji pack... please wait.

errors.reloadFailed: {emoji.1050} Failed to reload default pack. Please try again.

content.title: ### {emoji.1039} Support
content.description:
If you need help with the bot or are experiencing any issues, feel free to ask on our [Discord](https://discord.gg/A7ZVTFd4p9).
For emotional and financial support, you can buy me a coffee here: [Buy Me A Coffee](https://buymeacoffee.com/wosland) {emoji.1039}

processStatusField.name: Process Status

autoResumeField.name: Auto-Resume Timer
autoResumeField.value: This process will automatically resume in 5 minutes if no action is taken.

content.resumedProcess: Process resumed and queued for execution.

errors.noPermission: You do not have permission to resume this process.

common.noPermission: {emoji.1050} You do not have permission to perform this action.
